great_weapon_master.name: Great Weapon Master
great_weapon_master.description: You've learned to put the weight of a weapon to your advantage, letting its momentum empower your strikes.

features.name: Bonus Attack
features.description: On your turn, when you score a critical hit with a melee weapon or reduce a creature to 0 hit points with one, you can make one melee weapon attack as a bonus action.

features.name: Power Attack
features.description: Before you make a melee attack with a heavy weapon that you are proficient with, you can choose to take a -5 penalty to the attack roll. If the attack hits, you add +10 to the attack's damage roll.

sharpshooter.name: Sharpshooter
sharpshooter.description: You have mastered ranged weapons and can make shots that others find impossible.

features.name: Ignore Cover
features.description: Attacking at long range doesn't impose disadvantage on your ranged weapon attack rolls.

features.name: Ignore Long Range
features.description: Your ranged weapon attacks ignore half cover and three-quarters cover.

features.name: Power Shot
features.description: Before you make an attack with a ranged weapon that you are proficient with, you can choose to take a -5 penalty to the attack roll. If the attack hits, you add +10 to the attack's damage roll.

crossbow_expert.name: Crossbow Expert
crossbow_expert.description: Thanks to extensive practice with the crossbow, you gain several benefits.

features.name: Ignore Loading
features.description: You ignore the loading quality of crossbows with which you are proficient.

features.name: Point Blank Shot
features.description: Being within 5 feet of a hostile creature doesn't impose disadvantage on your ranged attack rolls.

features.name: Hand Crossbow Attack
features.description: When you use the Attack action and attack with a one-handed weapon, you can use a bonus action to attack with a hand crossbow you are holding.

polearm_master.name: Polearm Master
polearm_master.description: You can keep your enemies at bay with reach weapons.

features.name: Bonus Attack
features.description: When you take the Attack action and attack with only a glaive, halberd, quarterstaff, or spear, you can use a bonus action to make a melee attack with the opposite end of the weapon.

features.name: Opportunity Attack
features.description: While you are wielding a glaive, halberd, pike, or quarterstaff, other creatures provoke an opportunity attack from you when they enter your reach.

lucky.name: Lucky
lucky.description: You have inexplicable luck that seems to kick in at just the right moment.

features.name: Luck Points
features.description: You have 3 luck points. Whenever you make an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, you can spend one luck point to roll an additional d20.

resilient.name: Resilient
resilient.description: Choose one ability score. You gain proficiency in saving throws using the chosen ability.

features.name: Saving Throw Proficiency
features.description: You gain proficiency in saving throws using the chosen ability score.

tough.name: Tough
tough.description: Your hit point maximum increases by an amount equal to twice your level when you gain this feat.

features.name: Extra Hit Points
features.description: Your hit point maximum increases by an amount equal to twice your level.
